Chapter 7 Noise We have download the Danish Environmental Protection Agency, and its ftp server link (i.e. Noise - Noise2012 - GST Støjdata 2012 - ds_pg_data_noise_poly), and save on .~/data. The data are measured at 1.5 meter, and are divided in 5 categories: Category 1: 55-60 dB Category 2: 60-65 dB Category 3: 65-70 dB Category 4: 70-75 dB Category 5: > 75 dB wkt <- st_as_text(st_geometry(study_area[1,])) noise_2012 <- read_sf("data/GST Støjdata 2012 - ds_pg_data_noise_poly/ds_pg_data_noise_poly.shp", wkt_filter = wkt) noise_2012_B1 <- noise_2012 %>% filter(noise_cl == "B1") %>% st_make_valid() %>% st_crop(study_area) noise_2012_B1_g <- noise_2012_B1 %>% group_by(noise_cl, noise_in, org, origin_fil) %>% summarise(n = n()) %>% ungroup() mypal <- c("#0065FD", "#9833C9", "#FD3300", "#FD9800", "#FDFD00") ggplot() + geom_sf(data = study_area, fill = "grey", color = "grey50", size = 0.05) + geom_sf(data = noise_2012_B1_g, aes(fill = factor(noise_in)), col = NA) + scale_fill_manual(name = "Category", values = mypal) + theme_void()
